ErrorCaptureGeneral.message: See browser console for more detail.

ErrorContentScriptNotReady.message: The content script is not ready or cannot be loaded. Refresh this page, wait for all elements to be loaded, and try again.

WarnCaptureCyclicRefercing.message: Resource '$SOURCE$' has a circular reference to '$TARGET$', which will be blanked because current capture configuration does not support circular reference.
